name: Friday the 2nd
description:
This is Friday, a mystery story following our detective lead. A person has gone missing and it is up to you to solve the case. Talk to the residents and see if you can gather enough information to figure out what happened. The game is fully controlled with the mouse. You can hit escape to quit at any time.

Made by Caleb, Brian, Neal, Taylor, and Frank as part of a master's class at Lindenwood University.

Inspired by a previous game made by another group that Taylor was a part of:

https://tbazhaw.wixsite.com/friday
